text: Hagi rama'a vahetami zamazeri zamagogofesuge'za negage'za zamagogogu nehanageno, kini vahe'mo'zama negagesu'za tusi antri nehu'za zamagogogu hugahaze. Na'ankure zamagra negesage'na bainati kazinknona eri verave korave huna vugahue. Ana knareti'ma agafama huno vanige'za, ana zankura mika zupa zamagesa nentahi'za zamagogogura hugahaze.
